content.text: Match ends, Leicester City 2, Liverpool 3.
Second Half ends, Leicester City 2, Liverpool 3.
Foul by Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain (Liverpool).
Kelechi Iheanacho (Leicester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Alberto Moreno (Liverpool) because of an injury.
Jamie Vardy (Leicester City) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Alberto Moreno (Liverpool) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jamie Vardy (Leicester City).
Foul by Harry Maguire (Leicester City).
Jordan Henderson (Liverpool) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Georginio Wijnaldum (Liverpool) right footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain.
Dejan Lovren (Liverpool) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Wes Morgan (Leicester City).
Attempt blocked. Wilfred Ndidi (Leicester City) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Offside, Liverpool. Daniel Sturridge tries a through ball, but Mohamed Salah is caught offside.
Jamie Vardy (Leicester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dejan Lovren (Liverpool).
Corner,  Liverpool. Conceded by Kasper Schmeichel.

Substitution, Leicester City. Islam Slimani replaces Marc Albrighton.
Attempt missed. Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain (Liverpool) right footed shot from the left side of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Daniel Sturridge.
Substitution, Liverpool. Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain replaces Philippe Coutinho.

Substitution, Leicester City. Kelechi Iheanacho replaces Shinji Okazaki.
Substitution, Liverpool. James Milner replaces Emre Can.
Penalty saved! Jamie Vardy (Leicester City) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the top centre of the goal.
Simon Mignolet (Liverpool) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Penalty conceded by Simon Mignolet (Liverpool) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty Leicester City. Jamie Vardy draws a foul in the penalty area.
Goal!  Leicester City 2, Liverpool 3. Jamie Vardy (Leicester City) header from the left side of the six yard box to the centre of the goal.
Attempt saved. Demarai Gray (Leicester City) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Marc Albrighton with a cross.

Foul by Georginio Wijnaldum (Liverpool).
Goal!  Leicester City 1, Liverpool 3. Jordan Henderson (Liverpool) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Daniel Sturridge following a fast break.
